definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Objective To summarize adjust of some antimicrobial dose in continuous renal replacement therapy (CRRT).
sentences.chinese: 目的小结部分抗菌药物在CRRT治疗中的剂量调整。

sentences.english: On the medullary substance surface, there is a layer of simple epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴小结的髓质外侧表面付有单层上皮。

sentences.english: This paper is a brief review of the research and development work over past years.
sentences.chinese: 谨以此文对过去几年来的研发工作进行小结和回顾。

sentences.english: Now I will give you a personal work summary.
sentences.chinese: 现在我就给大家一篇个人工作小结的范文。

sentences.english: There were few primary lymph nodules which devoid of germinal centre in the lymph nodes.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴结已形成极少数不具生发中心的初级淋巴小结。

sentences.english: Qi-invigorating and Blood-activation Therapy in vocal nodules of children is effective and feasible.
sentences.chinese: 使用益气活血法进行治疗儿童声带小结有效而可行。

sentences.english: Finally, a summary of the development approaches of aero-engines is given for each country.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对航空发动机技术发展思路和实施途径做小结。

sentences.english: Finally, it summerizes the empirical analysis made above.
sentences.chinese: 通过上述分析，再对实证结果小结。

sentences.english: If this summary doesn't narrow down your decision, don't worry.
sentences.chinese: 如果这个小结仍然无法缩小决策范围，那么不要担心。

sentences.english: To the end of each chapter I have the outline for the short lead - Summary.
sentences.chinese: 每一章的结尾我有一段提纲引领式的简短小结。

sentences.english: Includes the flocculus and nodulus and is related to equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 其包含小脑的绒球和小结以及它和平衡有关。

sentences.english: "What's this thing I'm feeling here? This hard little knot, on theleft side," she said.
sentences.chinese: “这是什么？这儿有个硬硬的小结，在左侧。”她说。

sentences.english: Magee: Can I now chart our present position in the whole discussion?
sentences.chinese: 现在来小结一下我们的讨论，好吗？

sentences.english: On Sunday we rested, cleaned up, reflected.
sentences.chinese: 星期天我们休整一天，打扫卫生，还小结了一下。

sentences.english: On histological examination the typical characteristics of rheumatoid nodules were found.
sentences.chinese: 组织学检查发现典型的特征性的类风湿性小结。

sentences.english: In conclusion, the political characteristic of Shunzhi Dynasty was summed up simply.
sentences.chinese: 结语部分，对顺治朝政治特点作了简单的小结。

definition: to comment/a point by point commentary
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
